general.commandDeleted: [register] Command `{0}` has been deleted due to unknown file
general.commandSkipped: [register] Command `{0}` has been purged! No data left.
general.forwarded: -# This message will be forwarded to the developer team automatically

general.botNoPermissions: 🚫 The bot do not have enough permissions to execute this.
general.botNoAccess:
🚫 The bot do not have access to this channel/thread.

Please do _Edit Channel_ and put the bot to access or add role that has access to this channel/thread.
general.error: ⚠️ Unexpected error occurred. Please try again. If the issue persist, please contact administrator!
general.serverBusy: Server is currently busy, please try again later. If the issue persist, please contact administrator!
